item.title: Integrating Python code in R
item.description: Hello! In this blog post I will discuss how R Markdown can utilize more than one language in its code chunks. You can type code in R like #R Code Chunk numbers <- c(1,2,3,4,5) mean(numbers) ## [1] 3 You can also type code in Python like #Python Code Chunk import statistics from statistics import mean numbers1 = [1,2,3,4,5] mean(numbers1) ## 3 Reticulate lets you interact R code with Python code!

item.title: project 1
item.description: R Markdown Introduction For this project, I will be comparing three datasets. The first is data from my spotify account. This dataset consists of the date and time, artist name, track name, and ms played for each song. The next dataset is from my health app. This dataset also has date and time, and the amount of steps I took at each time. These two will be joined together with date.
